archimate:CommunicationNetwork.name: Private Network
archimate:CommunicationNetwork.documentation:
A network that is used for the only purpose of realising the physical communication among Interoperable European Solution (e.g. sTESTA), and cannot be accessed by the public.
Source: ISA2 - EIA Action

properties.value: [ Exposed for reuse as main service | Exposed for reuse as supporting service | Reused ]
